mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , B.ID , B.GDBH , B.DPRTCODE , B.GDBT , B.KDRQ , B.JH_KSRQ , B.JH_JSRQ , B.JH_ZD , B.YBGS , B.QXMS , B.JYCLFA , B.REC_CZLS , B.GDBH AS REC_HD , B.REC_CZSM , B.REC_CZSJ , B.REC_IP ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME ,(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION FROM B_S2_014_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from B_S2_014_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= B.REC_CZSJ ) WHERE 2 >= RNO

SELECT * FROM(
SELECT B.* ,'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,'工卡' YWLX_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.BJLX = 1 THEN '航材' WHEN B.BJLX = 2 THEN '工具' WHEN B.BJLX = 3 THEN '设备' END ) BJLX_NAME ,'' REC_HD FROM B_G2_997_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.YWID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.BJLX = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT B.* ,'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,'工卡' YWLX_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.BJLX = 1 THEN '航材' WHEN B.BJLX = 2 THEN '工具' WHEN B.BJLX = 3 THEN '设备' END ) BJLX_NAME ,'' REC_HD FROM B_G2_997_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.BJLX = 1 AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_S2_014_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_013_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
) A ORDER BY A.XC ASC

SELECT * FROM(
SELECT B.* ,'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,'工卡' YWLX_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.BJLX = 1 THEN '航材' WHEN B.BJLX = 2 THEN '工具' WHEN B.BJLX = 3 THEN '设备' END ) BJLX_NAME ,'' REC_HD FROM B_G2_997_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.YWID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.BJLX in (2,3)
UNION ALL
SELECT B.* ,'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,'工卡' YWLX_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.BJLX = 1 THEN '航材' WHEN B.BJLX = 2 THEN '工具' WHEN B.BJLX = 3 THEN '设备' END ) BJLX_NAME ,'' REC_HD FROM B_G2_997_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.BJLX in (2,3) AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM B_S2_014_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM B_G2_013_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
) A ORDER BY A.XC ASC
